review: Not that the movie was bad, it just had every opportunity to become something insane like the trailer promised us. And it just wasn't.

Personally I thought the movie slapped. I think the biggest problem was the fans hyping it up to be some kind of ensemble of cameos and expecting to be bigger than what it was when they never really advertised it as such. I mean they were never gonna do a whole Avengers-Level Multiverse threat in this movie. Alls the film did was lay groundwork for what will become Doomsday/Secret Wars.
According to me the movie was over hyped, it didn't deserve that title. the movie wasn't like bad
